state: It's time to explore the amazing world of TextWorld! First off, if it's not too much trouble, I need you to make an attempt to go east. Then, make an effort to go to the south. After that, attempt to head south. After that, take a trip west. Then, try to take a trip west. Once you manage that, try to take a trip south. With that done, pick up the passkey from the floor of the kitchenette. Once that's all handled, you can stop! -= Pantry =- You arrive in a pantry. A typical kind of place. Look over there! a counter. The counter appears to be empty. Hm. Oh well You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded. > -= Pantry =-0/1
next_state: -= Workshop =- You find yourself in a workshop. An ordinary kind of place. Okay, just remember what you're here to do, and everything will go great. You can see a locked portmanteau. There is an open gateway leading east. There is an unguarded exit to the north. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south. There is an unguarded exit to the west. > -= Workshop =-0/2
